com.base.engine

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.base.engine.Animation

  • public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
    Animation class: Collection of sprites that have a delay between frames Can be started, stopped, updated, and rendered

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Sprite[] frames 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Animation(int nFrames, int x, int y, java.lang.String file, int widthofImage, int heightofImage, int width, int height)
      Creates a new animation using the passed sprite sheet

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Sprite getCurrentFrame()
      Returns the current frame of the animation
      boolean isStopped()
      Checks if the animation is stopped
      void nextFrame()
      Changes the animation to the next frame
      void render(float xPos, float yPos)
      Renders the current frame at the x y pos
      void restart()
      Restarts the animation frame delay
      void setFrameDelay(int time_ms)
      Sets the frame delay between frames
      void start()
      Starts the animation
      void stop()
      Stops the animation at current frame

      Updates the animation to the next frame if the animation has been started

      • frames

        public Sprite[] frames

    • Constructor Detail

      • Animation

        public Animation(int nFrames,
                 int x,
                 int y,
                 java.lang.String file,
                 int widthofImage,
                 int heightofImage,
                 int width,
                 int height)
        Creates a new animation using the passed sprite sheet
        Parameters:
        nFrames - Number of frames of the animation
        x - Start x coord of the image on the sprite sheet
        y - Start y coord of the image on the sprite sheet
        file - Sprite sheet to use
        widthofImage - width of image to be used when getting image from sprite sheet
        heightofImage - height of image ot be used when getting image from sprite sheet
        width - width of sprite
        height - height of image

        Checks if the animation is stopped
